body.p:
Tracked changes by default do not influence the published output. Certain parameters can be enabled to show tracked changes and comments in WebHelp Responsive and PDF outputs:
WebHelp Responsive - Enable the webhelp.show.changes.and.comments publishing parameter. See more details here:
PDF (CSS based) publishing - Enable the show.changes.and.comments publishing parameter. See more details here: .
PDF (XSL-FO based) publishing - Enable the show.changes.and.comments publishing parameter.
